name: Ogerpon
flavorText: This Pokémon's type changes based on which mask it's wearing. It confounds its enemies with nimble movements and kicks.

previous.name: Fezandipiti
previous.flavorText: Fezandipiti owes its beautiful looks and lovely voice to the toxic stimulants emanating from the chain wrapped around its body.

next.name: Archaludon
next.flavorText: It gathers static electricity from its surroundings. The beams it launches when down on all fours are tremendously powerful.
